line.comment: * Only ready mechanics which did not reach max values in mechanical and engeneering skills are to be trained
* Mechanic in training is busy for 15 minutes
* If a marine reached 100 in one or more skills, annul his training assignment, if he is to be trained in that skill
* Only marines ordered to train some skill and not in training already are to be trained, marine in training is busy for 15 minutes
* Only ready mechanics which did not reach max values in mechanical and engeneering skills are to be trained, mechanic in training is busy for 15 minutes
* If a marine reached 100 in one or more skills, annul his training assignment, if he is to be trained in that skill
* Only marines ordered to train some skill and not in training already are to be trained, marine in training is busy for 15 minutes

sval.val: Only ready mechanics which did not reach max values in mechanical and engeneering skills are to be trained
Mechanic in training is busy for 15 minutes
If a marine reached 100 in one or more skills, annul his training assignment, if he is to be trained in that skill
Only marines ordered to train some skill and not in training already are to be trained, marine in training is busy for 15 minutes
Only ready mechanics which did not reach max values in mechanical and engeneering skills are to be trained, mechanic in training is busy for 15 minutes
If a marine reached 100 in one or more skills, annul his training assignment, if he is to be trained in that skill
Only marines ordered to train some skill and not in training already are to be trained, marine in training is busy for 15 minutes
